title: May Finds His Voice
backCoverBlurb: May has something important to say! Join him as he finds his courage, speaks up for his friends, and discovers that even a small voice can be very strong.
characterDescription: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. He has an expressive and slightly nervous face. He is wearing a blue and white striped shirt.

pages.text: May wanted to lead the circle time. He had a great idea for a new game! Can you whisper a secret?
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is sitting in a circle with other children, looking thoughtful and inspired.

pages.text: But his voice felt very tiny and shy. He looked at his shoes. They were soft and brown.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is looking down at his feet with a slightly nervous and shy expression on his face.

pages.text: What if no one hears me? May wondered. His heart went: thump, thump, thump.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May has his hand on his chest and looks a bit worried, his blue eyes are wide.

pages.text: He practiced with his teddy bear. Hello! said May in a clear voice. Say hello too!
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is standing in front of his teddy bear and talking to it with a small smile.

pages.text: May's friend Isabella encouraged him. You can do it, May! she whispered.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. A girl with auburn hair is patting May's arm kindly and smiling at him.

pages.text: May took a very deep breath. It felt cool in his throat. One, two, three...
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is standing with his eyes closed, taking a big, slow breath to find his courage.

pages.text: He stood up tall. I have an idea! he said. His voice was strong and bright.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is standing up in the circle with a confident smile and his arms open wide.

pages.text: Everyone listened to May. They liked his game very much! Yay, May! they cheered.
pages.imagePrompt: A group of happy children are clapping and smiling at May, who looks very proud and joyful.

pages.text: May felt so proud. He had found his voice and spoken up for what he wanted.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is standing tall and looking empowered with a big, happy smile.

pages.text: Speaking up made May feel very strong and happy inside. It felt like sunshine.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is looking up at the bright sun through the window with a look of pure joy.

pages.text: Now May was ready for any big moment. He knew he could do anything!
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is standing at the front of the line, looking ready for a new adventure.

pages.text: Goodnight, brave May. Sleep with a strong and happy heart. You did it! Shhh...
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. A peaceful close-up of May sleeping soundly with a look of confidence on his face.
